messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Regime change - urgently required! For, 1) commonsense; 2) the Commonwealth and 3) a common interest in a society for all. We must reinstate our Identity, Community, Youth, Elders and Country and let 'blue-Labour' and the LibLabCon's know they do not have the monopoly. We need local democracy, referenda and effective change. No - to cuts. No - to open door policies. No - to student debt. Yes - to controlled borders & Yes - to jobs. ENOUGH IS ENOUGH!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home by stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid.
issues.economy: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
issues.governance: We need local democracy, referenda and effective change.
issues.health: UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service.
issues.immigration: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
issues.socialWelfare: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage.

housing.content: UKIP will SCRAP the bedroom tax.

images.caption: CLIVE MORRISON in Hornsey and Wood Green Standing Up for Real Change
